attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for medical purposes for not only physical but mental health
attributes.additional_details: My partner suffers with severe mental health problems, cannabis contains NO HARMFUL chemicals, it leads to absolutely no health problems, it promotes positive thoughts and feelings. It can eliminate seizures, severe pain, anxiety, severe depression and even stop people from feeling suicidal. This is a medicine, the same as antidepressants, or any other medicine that helps to take peoples pain away. Please please realise, talk and legalise cannabis.
attributes.background: To discuss how cannabis can help improve both physical and mental illness in people of all ages. To get residents to share their experience on how they feel. Aim to legalise cannabis alongside alcohol and tobacco.
